CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Polymer solar cell devices based on the blend films of PSFDTBT and PC71BM show a high open - circuit voltage of 0.94 V and a power conversion efficiency of 4.6% without any post-treatment.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Polymer solar cell devices based on the blend films of PSFDTBT and PC71BM show a high open - circuit voltage of 0.94 V and a power conversion efficiency of 4.6% without any post-treatment.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| open-circuit voltage |
| voltage |
| of PSFDTBT and PC71BM based Polymer solar cell devices |
| power conversion efficiency |
| efficiency |
| without any post-treatment |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| open-circuit voltage of PSFDTBT and PC71BM based Polymer solar cell devices |
| power conversion efficiency of PSFDTBT and PC71BM based Polymer solar cell devices |

Note: "PSFDTBT and PC71BM" can be considered as a single material entity, so it could also be written as "open-circuit voltage and power conversion efficiency of PSFDTBT:PC71BM based Polymer solar cell devices" or "open-circuit voltage and power conversion efficiency of the blend of PSFDTBT and PC71BM in Polymer solar cell devices".
